Description: A simple and delicious carrot and coriander soup recipe that'll give any other carrot and coriander soup a run for its money. The secret is roasting your veg until it's nice and caramelised.

Title: Sweet & Sour Hasselback Aubergine with Rice
Description: This faff-free recipe looks super impressive served on a table. If you're not hasselback-ing your aubergines, what are you doing with your life?

Title: Smoked Aubergine Milanese
Description: Crunchy, creamy, smoky aubergine nugget with tomato sauce – an amazing vegetarian take on a milanese (or katsu) to enjoy over steaming hot rice.

Title: Tomato & Basil Pasta
Description: I can’t think of a more perfect pasta for a balmy summer evening than this tomato and basil pasta. It’s not often that you can enjoy warm, chewy al dente spaghetti with the bright juiciness of a summer tomato in one forkful. Well, here’s your chance.

Title: Thai Coconut Rice Pudding With Sesame Peanut Crunch
Description: We love rice pudding and we love Thai coconut rice. This is the best of both worlds. It's salty and sweet and the crunch on top is so addictive.

Title: Roasted Squash & Mozzarella Salad
Description: This seasonal winter salad satisfies all the cravings. It’s hearty, healthy and nutritious.

Title: Gobi Manchurian
Description: This gobi Manchurian recipe from Antony Amourdoux is a real crowdpleaser. You'll love how sweet, sticky, and spicy it is.

Title: Brothy Roast Squash & Pasta With Greens
Description: Think of this recipe as a wintery minestrone, but less soupy and topped with green pesto for a low effort zhuzh. It’s warming, easy and packed full of vitamins to keep you healthy over the colder months.

Title: Pea & Leek Soup With Chilli Jam Goat’s Cheese Toasts
Description: This is our take on an old school comfort leek and potato soup with some frozen peas and a bag of salad thrown in to make this as vibrant as it is comforting. Plus cheesy chilli jam toasts for pizazz.

Title: Halloumi & Roasted Grape Giant Couscous
Description: Roasted grapes are a current obsession - we love how jammy they go when they burst. Their sweetness is perfect with salty halloumi in this simple, one pan veggie tray bake that you’ll be making on repeat.

Title: Miso Onion Soup
Description: A simple and delicious tray soup that's worth simmering up on the weekend.

Title: Chickpea Tikka Masala Wraps
Description: The curried onion, peppers and chickpeas combine with the speedy coriander sauce, yoghurt and lettuce for an absolute vibe. Use dairy-free yoghurt and wraps to keep this one plant based.

Title: Peanut Butter Paneer Curry
Description: This midweek curry is the perfect veggie number to comfort while also getting in a dose of veg. It's good eating.

Title: Chunky Vegetable Soup With Squash, Kale & Parmesan Croutons
Description: Packed with vegetables and all sorts of goodness, this vegetable soup recipe will cure just any cold. Maybe. Don't use this as a substitute for actual medicine. Do eat it for dinner.

Title: Tomato Curry Egg Drop Rice
Description: When I am home, tired, hungry and need something quick and nourishing I make this. A take on a classic Hong Kong dish, with a little spice and inspired by Lucas Sin’s egg drop method.

Title: "Heal Me" Minestrone Soup
Description: There are few soups better than a minestrone, and this minestrone soup recipe from Alfie Steiner (aka @alfiecooks_) is pure comfort in a bowl. Guaranteed to make you feel better, whatever the weather, it’s packed full of your favourite veggies and juicy legumes, making it incredibly good for you too. An absolute winter staple.

Title: Roasted Carrot Soup With Sesame Halloumi Croutons
Description: Soup is a staple in our flat. It never fails to blow my mind the flavour you get out of roasted veg. Here, I’ve gone for classic carrot with some cumin, garlic and pomegranate molasses for a tangy kick. Plus there are spicy sesame cheese ‘croutons’ on top, because why not?

Title: Ginger Lemon Lentil Porridge
Description: Inspired by Khicidi (or Khichri) with plenty of gentle lentils, this recipe is a great source of protein and nutrition. We added lots of lemon ginger and aromatic ginger sesame oil for a proper warming bowl of serious cosy goodness.

Title: Creamy Celeriac Pasta with Nutty Herb Crumb
Description: This vegan pasta gets its creamy texture with the help of the celeriac. It’s full of umami and is very easy to make.

Title: Veggie Egg Fried Rice
Description: A belter of a dish. Charred veggies and eggy rice, topped with the crispiest shallots in the land. So easy. So cheap. So delicious.

Title: Broccoli Cheese Pie
Description: It's pie weather. This cheesy, veggie-friendly pie is loaded with broccoli and a mountain of cheddar. It's just the thing to get you through the evening.

Title: Roasted Cauliflower and Green Tahini Salad
Description: A beautiful meal prep dish loaded with all the good stuff. Charred cauliflower and spiced chickpeas are gorgeous with the herby, nutty, vibrant dressing.

Title: Creamy Rose Harissa Spaghetti
Description: Why more people are not coating their spaghetti in spicy harissa paste, tonnes of herbs and creamy mascarpone we do not know. So flavoursome. So saucy.

Title: Squash and Tofu Red Curry
Description: Our vegan version of a Thai takeaway classic. Flavoured with punchy dried chillies and lemongrass, and served up with sticky Tilda Fragrant Jasmine Rice.

Title: Ben's Summer Tomato Pasta
Description: No dish makes tomatoes sing quite like this. Flavoured simply with herbs, chilli and garlic, this pasta is best when topped with gooey buffalo mozzarella.

Title: Aglio E Olio
Description: We have perfected the aglio e olio. Lemon is key. Creating an emulsion with the olive oil & the pasta water makes the most delicious pasta you'll ever eat. We got all the ingredients for this from Deliveroo.

Title: Muttar Paneer
Description: A mild, creamy Punjabi curry for all you cheese lovers. Fried paneer, sweet peas and all the spices. Ditch your takeaway and have this instead. Sophie x

Title: Singapore Noodles
Description: Contrary to what its name suggests, this is actually a Cantonese classic. We’ve omitted prawns and pork to make a non-traditional vegan version of that dish.

Title: Herby Green Rice Shakshuka
Description: This bright green herby shakshuka is packed with parsley and spinach before being topped with toasted pumpkin seeds. Delicious.

Title: Romesco Mac & Cheese
Description: We always wondered why romesco and mac & cheese hadn't been combined. The flavours work perfectly together. Tangy, smoky, cheesy, rich. The perfect mouthful.

Title: Chilli Paneer
Description: An iconic and must-have Indian takeaway. Soft paneer in a sweet and spicy sauce? It’s incredible and so easy to make.

Title: Green Goddess Chopped Salad
Description: A simple chopped salad with a green goddess dressing that's so good you'll want to swim laps in it.

Title: Spanakopita Orzo
Description: A Greek classic transformed into a nutritious, midweek meal that's ready in 30 minutes. This spanakopita orzo is going to be a regular on your dinner table.

Title: Citrus Salad
Description: This recipe has all the makings of a delicious salad. Juicy blood orange, creamy feta, and tangy capers combine to make something really special. Enjoy.

Title: Greek(ish) Tomato Barley
Description: A tomatoey pearl barley dish that’s not unlike a risotto then topped it with a fresh, lemony broccoli salad. It's packed full of nutrients to keep us healthy but it also kind of tastes like you could be sitting in the sun, eating at a taverna on the beach. Bliss.

Title: Charred Onion and Fennel Broth with Fregola, Chickpeas and Feta
Description: Onions and fennel are charred in a hot pan, then simmered in chicken stock with garlic, aromatics, fregola and chickpeas. Once cooked, the soup is finished with lots of soft green herbs, lemon and feta for a hearty but fresh dish.

Title: Black Bean Stew With Nutty Sprinkle
Description: A rich, nutty, spicy black bean dish inspired by Mole Poblano, served with tangy feta drizzle. To scoop up with tortilla crisps.

Title: Romesco Chickpeas
Description: Healthy weeknight dinners don't get much simpler than this. Packed with fibre and protein, this romesco chickpea recipe is a winner.

Title: Spanakopita (Spinach Filo Pie)
Description: This is my recipe for the perfect spanakopita, a spinach and tofu 'feta' pie. As close to the ones we eat at home in Cyprus as possible, it's a real treat.

Title: Pesto Veggie Traybake
Description: Roasted veggies, the crunchiest ciabatta croutons, with a delicious, rich homemade pesto dolloped on top. It just works.

Title: Loaded Veggie Quesadillas
Description: The perfect dinner party dish. Cheesy. Veggie. Crunchy. The whole 9 yards.

Title: Spiced Veggie Gyros
Description: The spiced roast veggies and the cooling tzatziki come together perfectly to form one of the all time great mouthfuls.

Title: Veggie Satay Noodles
Description: Charred veggies are key here. Key key key. Paired with the soft noodles and a creamy peanutty sauce its a very special dish.

Title: Smoky Veggie Enchiladas
Description: Smoky beans are the perfect filling inside these soft, warming enchiladas. Lots of cheddar on the top takes these to the next level.

Title: Triple Lemon Chickpeas
Description: Chickpeas with a zip. If you're into fresh and vibrant veggie-forward dinners then you'll really vibe with this.

Title: Rich Veggie Sausage Sweet Potato Bake
Description: The easiest weeknight dinner. Just throw it all in a tray and bake! You’ll need to stir a dressing together but that's as tricky as it gets, I promise.

Title: Roasted Potato Salad With Apricots, Fennel & Veggie Sausages
Description: This is an extra special take on the classic (but boring, sorry) potato salad. Fresh fennel and roasted apricots take things up a gear or two.

Title: Smoky Grilled Mushroom Döner
Description: If you find it hard to believe that a döner kebab can be healthy, we're here to prove you wrong. This veggie-style grilled mushroom döner will have you feeling like you're post night out minus the regret. Enjoy.

Title: Pulled Mushroom Ragù
Description: The richest, umami-est mushroom ragu you could dream of. Pulled oyster mushrooms replace meat here, and they do it well. Delightful.

Title: Batch Recipe: Veggie Chilli Sin Carne
Description: This is the ultimate veggie chilli packed full of beans, spices and some new ingredients that you might not have thought of using before.

Title: One-Pot Veggie & Leek Pie
Description: Taking the well-loved British chicken and leek pie, making it veggie, and cooking it in one pan. We’re serving ours with grilled Tenderstem. Easy and delicious.

Title: Bean Chilli-Stuffed Jacket Potato with Lime Pickled Onions & Avocado
Description: Everyone loves a jacket potato, so we’ve stuffed this with our ultimate veggie chilli for a midweek crowd-pleaser.

Title: Twice-Roasted Pumpkin & Salted Maple Pecan Drizzle
Description: Roasting your pumpkin twice makes it sweet and sticky and incredibly moreish. We've topped it off with a salted maple pecan drizzle that's to die for. A wicked veggie centrepiece.

Title: Mushroom Miso Barley Bowl
Description: This is for those who love creamy mushrooms.

Title: Veggie Meatball Kebabs With Fennel & Pumpkin Seed Slaw
Description: Herby courgette and veggie meatball kebabs on a bed of mustardy and tangy crème fraîche served with fresh and zingy fennel slaw. Delicious.

Title: Roast Broccoli with Tahini Dressing and Sesame Chilli Crisp
Description: Yinka Ogunbiyi (aka Food Fire and Soul) makes the ultimate veggie centrepiece – a beautiful roasted broccoli with a tahini dressing and homemade chilli oil.

Title: Sticky Sriracha Quorn Bowls
Description: This sticky sriracha rice bowl comes together in 20 mins to make a delicious weeknight dinner.

Title: Green Bean & Feta Pasta
Description: A simple vegetarian pasta recipe that you can make in 15 minutes. Nothing more, nothing less.

Title: Sweet & Spicy Ramen Fried 'Chicken' Burger
Description: A crispy, golden ramen burger with a spicy rich gochujang sauce. This is totally vegetarian and totally delicious.

Title: Cauliflower, Chickpea & Peanut Curry
Description: Packed with all the good stuff, this vegetarian curry is a batch cooking base that just keeps on giving.

Title: Braised Aubergine Lentils With Pesto Yoghurt
Description: Fudgy aubergines? Plump lentils? Pesto yoghurt? This recipe has got it all. A healthy midweek dinner.

Title: Cannellini Bean & Leek Miso Soup
Description: Quick, easy and nourishing vegan miso soup, packed with protein. One of my go-to store cupboard recipes, quicker than boiling pasta. A drizzle of chilli oil and squeeze of lemon finish off this dish perfectly, any day of the year

Title: Vegan Moussaka
Description: This is a classic Greek and Cypriot recipe, made with healthy, plant-based ingredients. It’s a cosy, homely dish that’s perfect for a Sunday lunch. This makes a huge portion but it freezes well, or feel free to halve the recipe.

Title: Vegan Tortilla Soup
Description: You may not think tortillas in soup would work well together, but we're here to tell you that it does. And best of all? It's completely vegan.

Title: Crispy Mushroom & Black Bean Tacos with Pea Guacamole
Description: Tasty vegan tacos with a homemade pea guacamole. Vegan recipes don't get better than this.

Title: Dill Pickle Soup with Rye Croutons
Description: If you're into pickles, you're going to be really into this dill pickle soup. It's tangy, briny, and extremely soothing. Get stuck in.

Title: Charred Cabbage & Giant Couscous
Description: Cabbage really doesn’t get the love it deserves. It’s one of the most affordable and versatile veggies out there. Here I’ve charred it and served it with some giant couscous and herby tahini sauce. It’s a great, cheap vegetarian dinner.

Title: Aubergine With Coconut Satay Sauce
Description: This vegan recipe combines a rich and fragrant satay sauce with fudgy baked aubergines. It's as good as that sounds.

Title: Garlicky White Beans, Roasted Purple Sprouting Broccoli, Chilli & Lemon
Description: If you're looking for a mid-week meal that's healthy and delicious, you're in the right place. Tuck in.

Title: Hazelnut Mocha Overnight Oats
Description: All the best bits of a mocha, but in overnight oat form. Plus Nutella. No need to say more, really.

Title: Spicy Egg & Cheese Breakfast Sandos
Description: These cheesy breakfast sandwiches with homemade coriander salsa are the best way to start your day. Make a big batch in advance and freeze them until you’re ready to eat. Trust us, knowing you have a stash of these in your freezer will improve your life.

Title: High-Protein Tiramisu Overnight Oats
Description: Start your day with some serious protein with these healthy tiramisu overnight oats. Who doesn’t want tiramisu for breakfast?

Title: Hot Sauce Egg Salad Sandos
Description: A meal prep high-protein breakfast that's genuinely delicious. This spicy egg salad sando is a hell of a way to start the day.

Title: Banoffee Overnight Oats
Description: Creamy, caramelly oats layered with bananas & a lush peanut-date sauce. Tastes like dessert, but it’s breakfast.

Title: Rolled Eggs Breakfast Wrap
Description: Inspired by Ugandan Rolex, we’ve taken the same rolled egg technique to make the base of this wrap. Fill it with anything you want, for a versatile and delicious breakfast on the go.

Title: Sticky Toffee Baked Oats
Description: A high-protein baked oat brekkie that’s packed with natural sweetness from the dates and bananas. Perfect for a meal prep breakfast – make a big batch on Sunday and you’ve got breakfast for the next few days.

Title: High-Protein Breakfast Beans & Eggs
Description: A high-protein breakfast recipe that's great for meal prep. You'll be craving this every morning.

Title: Chocolate & Raspberry Protein Overnight Oats
Description: A classic overnight oats recipe that you can adapt with your own favourite milks, flavourings and toppings. They’re super quick and easy to prepare and are the perfect make-ahead breakfast or post-workout refuel snack.

Title: Chilli Tahini Granola
Description: Homemade granola is so much better than the shop-bought stuff. This one's special. It's the perfect balance of salty and sweet, with a slight hint of spice. Z x

Title: Overnight Strawberry & Matcha Brekkie Bowl
Description: A creamy chia and seed pudding with gentle matcha and tahini flavours, topped with a fruity strawberry compote. Make a big old batch and enjoy it for days.

Title: Carrot Cake Bircher Muesli
Description: Carrot cake for breakfast? You bet. We've thrown all the flavours of your favourite cake into this healthy, high-fibre bircher muesli recipe. Tuck in.

Title: ZOE Granola
Description: Meet our ZOE-fied granola, with over 10 different plants to get you towards your 30 per week goal. You’ll also get a boost of fibre from the oat bran, psylium husk, nuts and seeds. Once you make this, you won’t want to go back to store-bought.

Title: Almond Croissant Baked Oats
Description: Basically an almond croissant in the form of baked oats, with some raspberries folded in for a bit of tang. It's fudgy, high in protein and ridiculously good.

Title: Morning Milk Tea Chia Pudding
Description: Move over overnight oats. This creamy healthy chia porridge with infused tea and spiced nuts and seeds is here to transform your mornings. Make a big batch and you’ve got breakfast for days.

Title: High-Protein Air Fryer Granola
Description: Let us show you how quick and easy it is to make healthy granola at home in your air fryer. This one is super high in protein too. A guaranteed good start to your day.

Title: Blueberry Crunch Overnight Oats
Description: Breakfast is the most important meal of the day. Make the most of that meal with these delicious blueberry-packed overnight oats.

Title: Super Berry Chia Pudding
Description: We’ve created a delicious and nutritious breakfast pot to make in a big batch and enjoy throughout the week. It’s the perfect way to start your day.

Title: Biscoff Baked Oats
Description: If you have a sweet tooth, these Biscoff baked oats are for you. It’s essentially cake for breakfast, although who says you can only have it for breakfast!? Plus it’s high in fibre and protein, so will help you to stay fuller for longer and energised throughout the day.

Title: High-Protein Banana Bread Baked Oats
Description: Start your morning right with this banana bread baked oatmeal, a protein and fibre-rich breakfast that tastes like a treat! Made with simple, wholesome ingredients, it’s also a nutritious option that supports your health goals.

Title: Peanut Butter Overnight Oats, Three Ways
Description: Our favourite overnight oats recipe. Make a big batch and mix up the toppings throughout the week. The yoghurt and almond milk make it extra creamy, the blueberries and vanilla give a burst of flavour, and the peanut butter and protein powder make it high in protein.

Title: Probiotic Bircher Muesli
Description: If you’re looking to set yourself up for a healthy week, prepping a bircher muesli is a fantastic way to pack in loads of plants. By swapping some of the yoghurt for kefir, you’re getting a healthy dose of fermented foods too. This recipe was made for customising so feel free to flavour yours however you choose.

Title: Raspberry, Almond Butter and Chia Seed Porridge
Description: Soak your oats overnight with your chia seeds for the smoothest porridge imaginable. Topped with almond butter, berries and maple syrup for a nutty, sweet kick.

Title: Gochujang Fish Curry
Description: Gochujang adds a lovely bit of heat to this curry. The whole dish can be on the table in under 30 minutes.

Title: Sausage Gochujang Rigatoni
Description: This spicy sausage pasta is a new favourite of ours, and we’re confident that it’ll become one of yours, too. On the table in 20 mins, it’s a weeknight hero. Sweet, fiery, and incredibly easy to make. You're going to love our sausage gochujang rigatoni.

Title: Creamy Gochujang Gnocchi with Cavolo Nero
Description: This spinach and mozzarella filled gnocchi takes just 5 mins to pan fry until it's super crispy. Add it to a creamy, smoky gochujang sauce for the perfect cosy mid-week dinner.

Title: Seema's Ultimate Gochujang Chicken Burger
Description: A crispy chicken burger laced with spicy gochujang. You queued over two hours for this bad boy, and now you can finally make it for yourself.

Title: Smoky One-Pot Gochujang Pasta
Description: A rich, silky pasta with spicy gochujang and sweet roasted peppers. Ready in just 30 minutes, this one’s a fiery, cheesy, one-pot dream.
